About [/et_pb_fullwidth_code][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”on|on|” module_class=”box-img-section” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_color=”#0f0f0f” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#0f0f0f” background_color_gradient_end=”#333333″ background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg”][et_pb_row custom_padding=”20px||20px|” module_class_2=”overlay-text” module_class=”box-img-left” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_image=”https://thevocalstars.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/kid-singer-3.png” background_size=”contain” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fade”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”About Vocal Star” _builder_version=”3.19.10″ header_2_text_color=”#00a2c3″ background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right”]

About Vocal Star

Performers of all ages learn from Pop Stars to Grammy award-winning producers and jump-start their career in the music business by preparing them for the opportunity of a lifetime — the chance to be signed by a record label and represented by a talent management agency.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/audition-form/” button_text=”Sign Up To Audition Today!” button_alignment=”center” module_class=”bg-blue” _builder_version=”3.19.10″ animation_style=”flip” animation_delay=”1050ms”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”||on” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_color=”#0f0f0f” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#0f0f0f” background_color_gradient_end=”#333333″ background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg” background_image=”https://thevocalstars.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/kid-singer-3.jpg” custom_padding=”0px||0px|”][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ custom_padding=”70px|20px|70px|20px” custom_margin=”0px||0px|” module_class_2=”overlay-text” module_class=” et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_color=”rgba(51,51,51,0.8)” background_size=”contain” width=”100%” width_tablet=”100%” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” max_width=”100%” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fade” make_fullwidth=”on”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”About Vocal Star” _builder_version=”3.19.10″ header_2_text_color=”#00a2c3″ text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right”]

About Vocal Star

Performers of all ages learn from Pop Stars to Grammy award-winning producers and jump-start their career in the music business by preparing them for the opportunity of a lifetime — the chance to be signed by a record label and represented by a talent management agency.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/audition-form/” button_text=”Sign Up To Audition Today!” button_alignment=”center” module_class=”bg-blue” _builder_version=”3.19.10″ animation_style=”flip” animation_delay=”1050ms”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_color=”#333333″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#333333″ background_color_gradient_end=”#00a2c3″ background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg” border_width_top=”2px” border_color_top=”#00a2c3″ border_width_bottom=”2px” border_color_bottom=”#ef3caf” box_shadow_style=”preset6″ animation_style=”slide”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.22.7″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”VocalSpot” _builder_version=”3.22.7″ header_2_text_color=”#877dc2″ background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg” background_layout=”dark”]

Vocal Star

The Vocal Star consists of working with famous recording artists, receiving online branding and marketing support, Q & A’s with industry professionals, song selection, image development, professional dance instructors, recording, performances, and media training. The music talent event culminates in a lavish finale awards show and banquet dinner.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ specialty=”on” module_class=”full-screen” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_image=”https://thevocalstars.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/microphone-bg.jpg” parallax=”on” parallax_method=”off”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ specialty_columns=”3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_row_inner admin_label=”Row” _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_column_inner type=”4_4″ saved_specialty_column_type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Here at Vocal Star” _builder_version=”3.19.10″ header_2_text_color=”#ef3caf” background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left”]

Here at Vocal Star, our goal is to help those with a passion for music jump-start their craft. We will get you on the fast track. You bring the talent and the voice, we’ll teach you the craft and get you fully prepared to succeed in the music business.

At VOCAL STAR you receive:

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][et_pb_row_inner custom_padding=”0px|||” admin_label=”Row” _builder_version=”3.19.10″ custom_margin=”10px|||”][et_pb_column_inner type=”1_2″ saved_specialty_column_type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”List” _builder_version=”3.19.10″ background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”fade” animation_delay=”900ms”]

  • Voice training and techniques
  • Consulting and collaborations with famous recording artists and multi-platinum producers
  • Social media marketing and online branding
  • Q&A’s with industry professionals
  • Song Selection
  • Songwriting and composing
  • Professional photography and album artwork
  • Dance and choreography training
  • Recording studio time

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][et_pb_column_inner type=”1_2″ saved_specialty_column_type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”List” _builder_version=”3.19.10″ background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”fade” animation_delay=”1150ms”]

  • Live performances
  • Red carpet training
  • Media training
  • Music video training
  • Audition training
  • Auditions and casting calls with music labels and executives
  • Perform for artist talent managers and agents
  • Music theatre training
  • Voice over training

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][et_pb_row_inner admin_label=”Row” _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_column_inner type=”4_4″ saved_specialty_column_type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_button button_url=”/audition-form/” button_text=”Sign Up To Audition Today!” button_alignment=”center” module_class=”bg-pink” _builder_version=”3.19.10″ animation_style=”flip” animation_delay=”1050ms”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_section]
